docstring.long_description:
If delay is non-zero, position is unused.

Requires a CONNECT_MSO2X block to create the connection.

Tested on MSO22 and MSO24.
docstring.short_description: Set the MSO2X oscilloscope horizontal position or delay.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MSO2X block).

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Delay after trigger, in seconds. Delay mode is turned on if not 0.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Horizontal position, in percent. Only used if delay is zero.
